Description: Green glazed composition shabti of the servant of the great goddess, Pashertaihet with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard and parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of hieroglyphic text; back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
